name: ShepardTone
0:
”Alexa, open Shepard Tone”
”Alexa, launch Shepard Tone”
”Alexa, ask Shepard Tone to play”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shepard tone
des:
A simple skill that plays the auditory phenomenon that is used to invoke intense feelings.
This tone has been used in many movies such as sci-fi and thrillers.
It has also been used for DTMF detection testing in the telecommunication world.
More detail can be found at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shepard_tone
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
